summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1971, for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue, from the north margin of East Pike Street to the north margin of East Pine Street, and East Pines Street, form the east margin of Thirty-third Avenue to the west margin of Thirty-fourth Avenue, by paving the same with asphalt, laid upon a proper concrete foundation with concrete curbs and armoured concrete corners and brick or concrete gutters, under Ordinance No. 20376, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
